item.description:
It's Kaiya's 3rd Birthday TODAY!!!!!

So we're having a birthday party instead of the usual playdate. Come join us to celebrate.

We will have cake, balloons, decorations and lots of fun!

Weather permitting, we may play out on our deck or at the little playspace I made at our cul-de-sac garden.  We will start with story time, featuring some of Kaiya's favorite books!  Maybe MJ can translate some on the fly to Cantonese or Mandarin!

I may have more up my sleeve... so stay tuned!
item.how_to_find_us: SMS/Call: 508-202-0097 or Comment Here on your status.
item.name: Mandarin-Cantonese PlayDate
